name: YouthAware
description: YouthAware Productions help students and teachers navigate topics that might otherwise be difficult to approach in a classroom setting. Since 1986, YouthAware’s innovative health and wellness programs for grades K-8 have explored issues such as self-care, peer pressure, bullying, substance abuse, violence, homophobia, gender identity, stereotypes, race, cultural competency, and HIV/AIDS awareness. Their performances are developed to address the ever-shifting cultural and social landscapes of our
